name: A polymer produced from tetrafluoroethylene
2-tetrafluoro-2-((1,2,2-trifluoroethenyl)oxy)ethanesulfonyl fluoride
FoodContactSubstance: A polymer produced from tetrafluoroethylene (CAS Reg. No. 116-14-3) and 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoro-2-((1,2,2-trifluoroethenyl)oxy)ethanesulfonyl fluoride (CAS Reg. No. 29514-94-1). The polymer is hydrolyzed and may optionally be further neutralized to its ammonium salt.
